about_the_game:
Earth: Year 2066 is a first person sci-fi apocalyptic open-world game where your main aim is to survive. Set in post-apocalyptic future, you take on the role as a survivor of a nuclear war between USA and China. You became a mutant because of radiation. You need to get to the safe place, called "GOD'S HOUSE" to survive. Dangerous journey is waiting for you. Earth: Year 2066 is inspired by Half-Life and Fallout.

Steam Greenlight

Features Currently Available

  • Early survival mode
In the current state it similar with arena mode. You shoot enemies and try not to die. In next versions we are going to make it with a lot of players, npcs, exploration and loot.
  • Part of the game world with some of the locations.
  • Droid as a playable character.
Droid moves like a human with realistic camera movement and freedom of movements.
  • Realistic damage reaction.
  • Some types of enemies.
  • Early destructable environment.
  • Oculus Rift support.
  • Windows, Linux and Mac support.

Roadmap(Near Future)

  • Coop(in may update) and multiplayer.
  • Story Mode with a lot of quests and characters.
  • Large open-world.
  • Mutants, zombies, raiders, survivors and other types of enemies and npcs.
  • A lot of guns/armors to customize.
  • Unique craft system.
  • Steam features: achievements, trading cards and other.
  • More languages.

Our Plan

We are going to make big and regular updates. We are going make big updates with new content and features at the end of every month and different fixes during every month. Our plan:
  • May Update:
Coop in survival mode.
New location.
More freedom of movements.
Other new content and features.
  • June Update:
Coming soon.

Controls in Early Survival Mode

WASD/Space/X - movements,
Mouse wheel - choose weapon
Mouse button 1 - fire, Mouse button 2 - sight.
1,2,3 - ammo type
detailed_description:
Earth: Year 2066 is a first person sci-fi apocalyptic open-world game where your main aim is to survive. Set in post-apocalyptic future, you take on the role as a survivor of a nuclear war between USA and China. You became a mutant because of radiation. You need to get to the safe place, called "GOD'S HOUSE" to survive. Dangerous journey is waiting for you. Earth: Year 2066 is inspired by Half-Life and Fallout.

Steam Greenlight

Features Currently Available

  • Early survival mode
In the current state it similar with arena mode. You shoot enemies and try not to die. In next versions we are going to make it with a lot of players, npcs, exploration and loot.
  • Part of the game world with some of the locations.
  • Droid as a playable character.
Droid moves like a human with realistic camera movement and freedom of movements.
  • Realistic damage reaction.
  • Some types of enemies.
  • Early destructable environment.
  • Oculus Rift support.
  • Windows, Linux and Mac support.

Roadmap(Near Future)

  • Coop(in may update) and multiplayer.
  • Story Mode with a lot of quests and characters.
  • Large open-world.
  • Mutants, zombies, raiders, survivors and other types of enemies and npcs.
  • A lot of guns/armors to customize.
  • Unique craft system.
  • Steam features: achievements, trading cards and other.
  • More languages.

Our Plan

We are going to make big and regular updates. We are going make big updates with new content and features at the end of every month and different fixes during every month. Our plan:
  • May Update:
Coop in survival mode.
New location.
More freedom of movements.
Other new content and features.
  • June Update:
Coming soon.

Controls in Early Survival Mode

WASD/Space/X - movements,
Mouse wheel - choose weapon
Mouse button 1 - fire, Mouse button 2 - sight.
1,2,3 - ammo type

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GTX/Radeon HD 4770 512mb
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Install size will gradually increase with future updates.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Quad Core 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660/Radeon HD 6850 1gb or more
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GTX/Radeon HD 4770 512mb
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Install size will gradually increase with future updates.
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Quad Core 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660/Radeon HD 6850 1gb or more
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
